domain.name: Air
domain.comment: You can control winds and the weather.

domain.name: Ambition
domain.comment: You strive to keep up with and outpace the competition.

domain.name: Cities
domain.comment: You have powers over urban environments and denizens.

domain.name: Confidence
domain.comment: You overcome your fear and project pride.

domain.name: Creation
domain.comment: You have divine abilities related to crafting and art.

domain.name: Darkness
domain.comment: You operate in the darkness and take away the light.

domain.name: Death
domain.comment: You have the power to end lives and destroy undead.

domain.name: Destruction
domain.comment: You are a conduit for divine devastation.

domain.name: Dreams
domain.comment: You have the power to enter and manipulate dreams.

domain.name: Earth
domain.comment: You control soil and stone.

domain.name: Family
domain.comment: You aid and protect your family and community more effectively.

domain.name: Fate
domain.comment: You see and understand hidden inevitabilities.

domain.name: Fire
domain.comment: You control flame.

domain.name: Freedom
domain.comment: You liberate yourself and others from shackles and constraints.

domain.name: Healing
domain.comment: Your healing magic is particularly potent.

domain.name: Indulgence
domain.comment: You feast mightily and can shake off the effects of overindulging.

domain.name: Knowledge
domain.comment: You receive divine insights.

domain.name: Luck
domain.comment: You’re unnaturally lucky and keep out of harm’s way.

domain.name: Magic
domain.comment: You perform the unexpected and inexplicable.

domain.name: Might
domain.comment: Your physical power is bolstered by divine strength.

domain.name: Moon
domain.comment: You command powers associated with the moon.

domain.name: Nature
domain.comment: You hold power over animals and plants.

domain.name: Nightmares
domain.comment: You fill minds with horror and dread.

domain.name: Pain
domain.comment: You punish those who displease you with the sharp sting of pain.

domain.name: Passion
domain.comment: You evoke passion, whether as love or lust.

domain.name: Perfection
domain.comment: You strive to perfect your mind, body, and spirit.

domain.name: Protection
domain.comment: You ward yourself and others.

domain.name: Secrecy
domain.comment: You protect secrets and keep them hidden.

domain.name: Sun
domain.comment: You harness the power of the sun and other light sources, and punish undead.

domain.name: Travel
domain.comment: You have power over movement and journeys.

domain.name: Trickery
domain.comment: You deceive others and cause mischief.

domain.name: Truth
domain.comment: You pierce lies and discover the truth.

domain.name: Tyranny
domain.comment: You wield power to rule and enslave others.

domain.name: Undeath
domain.comment: Your magic carries close ties to the undead.

domain.name: Water
domain.comment: You control water and bodies of water.

domain.name: Wealth
domain.comment: You hold power over wealth, trade, and treasure.

domain.name: Zeal
domain.comment: Your inner fire increases your combat prowess.
